text: "Wrong Side of Heaven" is a 2014 song by American heavy metal band Five Finger Death Punch and is taken from their fourth studio album The Wrong Side of Heaven and the Righteous Side of Hell, Volume 1. It went to number 12 in the Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 charts and number 11 in the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative Songs. ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Five Finger Death Punch songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Wrong Side of Heaven
